snippet.title: Hash Rush Beta Trailer 2020
snippet.description:
The recent crystal storm has destroyed many races and societies in the Hermeian Galaxy. Giant shards of crystals rained down from space, devastating anything in their path, and finally embedded themselves into the planet's crust. Now they have linked together to form the Crystal Scourge, a hive mind that has the singular purpose of corrupting and poisoning the planet for its own purposes.

Tasked with protecting their planet by mining and removing the Crystals, players will need to establish a mining colony, then defend themselves against the Crystal Scourge, its hordes of corrupted creatures, and it’s ultimate creation, the Crystal Titan.
